windows.name: Everything Search Engine - keeps a database of all the files
TreeSize - find space hogs on your hard disk
ShareX - free screenshot capture, screen recorder, file sharing
SharpKeys - maps one key on your keyboard to another
Quick Access Popup - free tool that lets you add applications, folders, websites, and more
FileMenu Tools - adds a customizable context menu to Windows Explorer
Rambox - a single place for a lot of online accounts
WSUS Offline - lets you download all the files required for updating Windows at once
AES Crypt - easy-to-use file encryption software
Ditto Clipboard Manager - free clipboard manager application
Patch My PC - keeps over 100 programs up-to-date
Input Director - enables the control of multiple Windows systems using the keyboard/mouse
